argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ldualkrsc.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ldualkrsc.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | ldualkrsc.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | ldualkrsc.f | |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) |
| 5 |  | ldualkrsc.l | |- L = ( LKer ` W ) |
| 6 |  | ldualkrsc.d | |- D = ( LDual ` W ) |
| 7 |  | ldualkrsc.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) |
| 8 |  | ldualkrsc.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) |
| 9 |  | ldualkrsc.g | |- ( ph -> G e. F ) |
| 10 |  | ldualkrsc.x | |- ( ph -> X e. K ) |
| 11 |  | ldualkrsc.e | |- ( ph -> X =/= .0. ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` R ) = ( .r ` R ) |
| 14 | 4, 12, 1, 2, 13, 6, 7, 8, 10, 9 | #P_ldualvs | |- ( ph -> ( X .x. G ) = ( G oF ( .r ` R ) ( ( Base ` W ) X. { X } ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( L ` ( X .x. G ) ) = ( L ` ( G oF ( .r ` R ) ( ( Base ` W ) X. { X } ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 12, 1, 2, 13, 4, 5, 8, 9, 10, 3, 11 | #P_lkrsc | |- ( ph -> ( L ` ( G oF ( .r ` R ) ( ( Base ` W ) X. { X } ) ) ) = ( L ` G ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( L ` ( X .x. G ) ) = ( L ` G ) ) |
